column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We went one Saturday for brunch with out a reservation and unfortunately we were turned away. We made a reservation for the following Saturday
column3: we were able to be seated. The kitchen manager came out and told us that there was a note on our reservation
column4: that we were there the previous week
column5: and that we had travelled from Hockley
column6: and he brought out the most delicious waffle
column7: saying thank you for coming back. This place is awesome. The food is great and we had a great brunch
